msbt.message: Man, how many months of allowance do you think I'd need to buy everything here, ?
? What kinda clothes do ya like? Maybe I'll get the same ones so we can match!
The clothes here are real neat! You oughta try some on. Walk around in 'em. Maybe jump and run too!
I'm gonna try on a buncha different clothes today!I love gettin' dressed up in clothes that aren't mine and running around pretending to be somebody else!
Man, isn't everything here super- duper really cool? There's all kindsa -y things to buy right now!
Heya! You here to see souvenirs? There's a buncha stuff other than clothes here, so have a look around!
This tailors place is neat! I can come in here and imagine being real cool and fashionable.
I like buying new stuff at the tailors, but I feel weird changing my clothes in the middle of the store.
I wonder how many times I've visited the tailors nowI wonder how many times I've wondered how many times I've visited the tailors now
